column4: anyone know how to fix an ethernet card that has the correct driver but no ip address
ifconfig
what can i tell from that, im really new to linux
under eth0:avahi it shows a self assigned ip
open a command terminal and you can read the man pages (manual pages) by typing "man whatever" then enter
you want to learn about "interfaces", "ifconfig" and "iwconfig" for wireless
btw...what ip address do you have?
the one it shows for the eth0:avahi is 169.....that business and in the graphic interface it just shows zeros for everything
you mean the gui "Network Manager"?
i dont think its network manager it is just the basic lower right thing in mint
not familiar with mint...does it look like wifi signal strength bars?
it looks like a LAN in windows, overlapping screens
click on it and tell me what you see
i see how retarded i am, ive been fricken right clicking this entire time
even have my wireless card now, fml
any body know why when I add a song to a playlist in VLC, the durations reads 0:00 and the file won't play?
thanks
no problem?
wcryer...meant .
yeah im good, thanks for your help, any pointers on setting up samba and whatever the print server thing is called
mezguitale: yes...I can play the files if I open the file itself, and I've been making playlists for days already, just suddenly today I can't

don't know much about samba...haven't used it, but the CUPS setup is what you want for setting up your printer...you'll need the ip address if your printer is networked, and for multi function devices, you'll most definitely need the appropriate software
